# opnsense_acmeclient_settings (Data Source)

Read an OPNsense acmeclient plugin settings.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `auto_renewal` (Boolean) Whether automatic renewal is enabled.
- `challenge_port` (Number) Port used for HTTP-01 challenge.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the ACME client is enabled.
- `haproxy_integration` (Boolean) Whether HAProxy integration is enabled.
- `log_level` (String) Log level for the ACME client (`normal`, `extended`, `debug`, `debug2`, `debug3`).
- `restart_timeout` (Number) Seconds to wait for service restart operations.
- `show_intro` (Boolean) Whether the introductory/help text is shown.
- `tls_challenge_port` (Number) Port used for TLS-ALPN-01 challenge.
